component.name: Apipost
component.summary: Apipost = Postman + Swagger + Mock + Jmeter, Backend, frontend, testing, and online collaboration with real-time content synchronization

description.p: NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by apipost.cn.
æç¤º: æœ¬æ„å»ºæœªç» apipost.cn éªŒè¯, æˆ–å¾—åˆ° apipost.cn çš„æ”¯æŒã€‚è¿™ä¸ªä¸€ä¸ªä¸ªäººæ„å»ºç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚
tips: Due to flatpak sandbox limitations, please do not check for upgrades within the application. This software localization only supports Chinese language.
Apipost is mainly divided into 5 major modules, which run through the entire development cycle of an API from design to testing and launch:

Used to predefine interface request parameters and response expectations (Mock) before the interface is fully developed, and automatically generate Mock URLs, allowing front-end and testing to enter the development process in advance
Used for preliminary interface debugging during the interface development process or when the development is about to be delivered, to verify whether the interface meets expectations
Used for automated testing of complex scenarios by testers after interface development is completed and delivered, in order to identify some issues
Used to quickly generate beautiful and standard interface documents. And supports online formats such as HTML, Markdown, Word, etc
Real time collaboration among multiple people:

The above 5 The large module involves multiple roles of the R&D team, and Apipost connects each role and their work scenarios through real-time collaboration. With the same data source, "one modification, multiple synchronized modifications" are made accurately and efficiently

âš¡ Optimize WebSocket, Socket.IO comprehensive upgrade, optimize interaction, and enhance stability; Websocket documentation Socket IO Usage Document ğŸš¨ Versions before 8.1.10 will no longer support Websocket and Socket The creation and update of IO require upgrading to the latest version. Data will not be lost after upgrading~
âš¡ Optimize interface documentation: Add custom display of message request examples and response examples to WebSocket and Socket.IO documentation for stronger readability;
âš¡ Optimize the function of comparing historical versions to reflect the change records of pre execution and post execution operations;
âš¡ Optimized some features in detail to enhance the overall user experience;
ğŸ Fix WebSocket and Socket The issue of IO not being able to connect successfully in certain situations Error caused by har file.
ğŸ Fix WebSocket and Socket The issue of invalid IO request header settings;
ğŸ Fix WebSocket and Socket The issue of IO being unable to use variables (including dynamic parameters);
ğŸ Fix WebSocket and Socket The issue of IO being unable to use proxies and certificates;
ğŸ Fixed the issue where some values contained escape characters, causing variables to not be extracted correctly;
ğŸ Fix the possible callback timed out issue when sending through the HTTP (s) interface;
ğŸ Fix the issue in the Cookie Manager where cookies with the path parameter do not take effect;

ğŸ Fixed the issue where the same key was not processed with the same key when sending requests, but the case was different. After repair, the case of key values will be ignored, and the priority order will be interface>directory>global, with interface parameter values given priority;
ğŸ Fixed the issue where the default service pre URL could not be switched correctly when switching projects;
ğŸ Fixed an issue in Mac systems where the client's double-click on the top bar failed to properly enlarge to adaptive size.
ğŸ”¥ Added Add button to save sample response in response area, allowing live response to be saved directly as sample response.
ğŸ”¥ Added Support exporting performance test report to HTML format.
ğŸ”¥ Added In the catalog, users can copy HTTP interface to cURL directly.
âš¡ Optimize the user experience of some features.
ğŸ Fix The error caused by uploading .har file when importing project.
ğŸ Fix the problem that the functional test in automation test incorrectly treats 2XX response codes such as 201, 203, etc. as failures.
ğŸ Fix the problem of displaying status error in Markdown after deleting the status of the interface in use.
ğŸ Fix An issue where Mock service debugging did not return the correct expected result in some scenarios.
ğŸ Fix Issue with incorrect partial escaping when generating request code.
ğŸ Fix Interface non-execution issue under Transaction Controller for automated testing.
ğŸ Fix Issue where after editing the authentication information of an interface and saving it, the entry did not appear in the history version.

âš¡Optimization The variables are adjusted to cloud values and local values, the cloud values will be synchronized among the project members, and the local values only support local debugging, avoiding the confusion of collaboration caused by always synchronizing the variable values.
âš¡Optimization The field description popup window is too narrow resulting in an unfriendly experience.
ğŸRepair the problem of reporting error when selecting some interfaces to export in the interface list.
ğŸFix the bug that authentication types jwt and asap are invalid.
ğŸRepair After using AI to generate annotations, clicking on Synchronize to Interface is unresponsive.
